description:
Darrel is definitely the introverted, brooding type. He's a dead ringer for Christian Bale and definitely gives off that very pensive vibe.
But when he takes off his clothes he turns into a completely different guy. Lean and muscular with a long dick — it's the most amazing transformation from multi-faceted intellectual to hot jock I've ever seen... and when he gets into getting himself off he gets very intense and the veins really start popping!
title: Darrel
